mapper.insert: insert into tbl_reply(bno, reply, replyer, secret, password, par_rno) values (#{bno}, #{reply}, #{replyer}, #{secret}, #{password}, #{parRno})
mapper.select: select * from tbl_reply where bno=#{bno} and isnull(par_rno) order by rno desc limit #{cri.pageStart}, #{cri.perPageNum}
select count(rno) from tbl_reply where bno=#{bno}
select count(par_rno) from tbl_reply where par_rno=#{parRno}
select replyer from tbl_reply where par_rno=#{parRno}
mapper.update: update tbl_reply set reply=#{reply}, updatedate=now() where rno=#{rno}
update tbl_reply set delete_flag="1" where rno=#{rno}
